meanings.definition: The action of bringing something to an end.
meanings.sent1: The terminations of the movie always make me emotional.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the terminations of the story to the class.
meanings.sent3: The terminations of the game left everyone in suspense.
meanings.sent4: The terminations of the play were unexpected and shocking.
meanings.sent5: The terminations of the contract were clear and final.

meanings.definition: The process of ending or concluding something.
meanings.sent1: The terminations of the project took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: She carefully planned the terminations of her presentation.
meanings.sent3: The terminations of the meeting were met with applause.
meanings.sent4: The terminations of the event marked a successful conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The terminations of the discussion brought closure to the issue.

meanings.definition: The act of firing or dismissing an employee.
meanings.sent1: The terminations of staff members were necessary for the company's restructuring.
meanings.sent2: He handled the terminations of employees with professionalism and empathy.
meanings.sent3: The terminations of the team members surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The terminations of the workers led to a new hiring process.
meanings.sent5: The terminations of the staff were announced in a meeting.

meanings.definition: The point at which something ends or ceases.
meanings.sent1: The road led to a dead end, a termination of our journey.
meanings.sent2: The termination of the relationship was inevitable.
meanings.sent3: The termination of the road was marked by a large sign.
meanings.sent4: The termination of the river flowed into a beautiful lake.
meanings.sent5: The termination of the trail was a breathtaking view.
